response.original_title: "Best of the Best" Provides New Views, Commentary of Shuttle Launches
response.overview: This video from the Glenn Research Center highlights in stunning, behind-the-scenes imagery the launches of three space shuttle missions: STS-114, STS-117, and STS-124. NASA engineers provide commentary as footage from the ground and from the orbiters themselves document in detail the first phase of a mission.
response.title: "Best of the Best" Provides New Views, Commentary of Shuttle Launches
